[font_awesome icon="star" size="24px" margin_right="5px" color="555"][font_awesome icon="star" size="24px" margin_right="5px" color="666"][font_awesome icon="star" size="24px" margin_right="5px" color="777"][font_awesome icon="star" size="24px" margin_right="5px" color="888"][font_awesome icon="star" size="24px" margin_right="5px" color="999"]

Beautiful design and very easy to use with the visual composer plugin and its add-on. Im very satisfied, just the best wordpress theme Ive used ever.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Feature Availability" heading_type="h3" icon="cube" heading_size="16px"]This is my favorite theme and I have used 100+ over the years. It is feature rich and support is superb. Plus, the developer is working to improve the theme with regular updates.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Code Quality" heading_type="h3" icon="code" heading_size="16px"]Ive been working with WordPress since 4 years now, in my whole career Ive never seen a theme well developed in such a manner that follows every guideline mentioned by Google.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" bg_style="stretch" css=".vc_custom_1489893954892{background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Customer Support" heading_type="h3" icon="support" heading_size="16px"]Awesome theme & support, author is involved in the WordPress community. item.title: Login
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_heading text="Custom Login Form" color="#444444"][vcex_spacing size="15px"][vc_column_text]Easily insert a login form on any page of your sitevia the visual Composer page builder to allow people to log into your WordPress site. You can use a plugin to redirect people to your custom login page. This can also be good for security reasons.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_login_form remember="false" lost_password="false" register="false"]You are currently logged in[/vcex_login_form][/vc_column][/vc_row]

The Visual Composer is a great plugin, but combined with the Total theme it is out of this world! We've extended the builder to bring you many unique and highly customizable modules.

We take pride in coding quality themes, we don't "steal" any code or take any shortcuts. We also keep our themes updated constantly to ensure everything is as well optimized as it can be.

[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Custom Skins" heading_type="h2" icon="magic" icon_size="42px"]

item.title: Homepage 14
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: [vc_row bg_style="stretch" css=".vc_custom_1489894766159{margin-top: 60px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="Drag & Drop Builder" heading_type="h2" icon="arrows" url_target="_self" heading_weight="400" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px"]Easily build layouts using a drag and drop page builder. Create unlimited layouts for your posts & pages, no need to memorize shortcodes.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="Responsive Design" heading_type="h2" icon="laptop" url_target="_self" heading_weight="400" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px"]The theme is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="50+ Builder Blocks" heading_type="h2" icon="star" url_target="_self" heading_weight="400" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px"]Included are 50+ modules to choose from to insert into your posts/pages so you can create amazing layouts. And more added all the time with updates![/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_style="stretch" css=".vc_custom_1489894770650{padding-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="Advanced Theme Panel" heading_type="h2" icon="cogs" url_target="_self" heading_weight="400" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px"]A super intuitive and complete theme panel is included so you can change everything including your site colors, container widths, image cropping sizes and much more![/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="Translation Ready" heading_type="h2" icon="globe" url_target="_self" heading_weight="400" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px"]The included .PO and .MO files, translatable theme panel (via WPML) and custom functions make it easy to use Total in your native language and/or multiple languages.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="WooCommerce Support" heading_type="h2" icon="shopping-cart" url_target="_self" heading_weight="400" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px"]Built-in support for the WooCommerce plugin will allow you to sell products on your site with ease. Everything has been designed & extended to fit perfectly with the theme.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" bg_style="stretch"][vc_column][vcex_portfolio_grid grid_style="no_margins" columns="4" order="DESC" orderby="date" img_crop="true" title="false" excerpt="false" read_more="false" img_filter="none" term_slug="all" img_width="500" img_height="350"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_style="stretch" css=".vc_custom_1489894781922{padding-top: 20px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="SEO Optimized" heading_type="h2" icon="search" url_target="_self" heading_weight="400" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading_size="18px"]We've paid close attention to SEO while developing this theme (headings, clean code, speed, etc). Your site must look good, but also rank well on search results.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="Boxed or Full-Width Layout" heading_type="h2" icon="columns" url_target="_self" heading_weight="400" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px"]Quickly switch between boxed or full-width layout for your website design. There is no need to dig into the stylesheet or change the grid system to get the layout you need.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="Custom Post Types" heading_type="h2" icon="picture-o" url_target="_self" heading_weight="400" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px"]Built-in custom post types for portfolios, testimonials and staff make it easy to add and manage your content. Simply use the included custom builder blocks to insert them anywhere.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_style="stretch" css=".vc_custom_1489894786850{padding-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="Clean Code" heading_type="h2" icon="code" url_target="_self" heading_weight="400" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading_color="#000000" heading_size="18px"]The theme is great for developers as well. The well commented and clean code makes it easy for you to tweak the theme and keeps it optimized and expandable.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="CSS3 Standards" heading_type="h2" icon="css3" url_target="_self" heading_weight="400" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading_size="18px"]This theme has been coded with the latest CSS3 code. Bringing you the best coding standards as well as some cool new tricks such as element animation on page scroll.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="HTML5 Standards" heading_type="h2" icon="html5" url_target="_self" heading_weight="400" icon_color="#000000" icon_size="24px" heading_size="18px"]The theme uses HTML5 so the code is up to the latest standards. We've also addedHTML5 markup for WordPress forms, search and comments.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1489894791623{padding-top: 65px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;background-color: #4a97c2 !important;}"][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_column_text font_weight="300" color="#ffffff" font_size="18px"]We'd love to work on your project. There's tons we can do to help you build a successful business. Contact us for a custom quote today![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vcex_button url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/base/contact-page/" title="Contact Us" layout="expanded" style="flat" font_weight="normal" font_size="18px" custom_background="#ffffff" custom_hover_background="#ffffff" custom_color="#4a97c2" custom_hover_color="#0a0202"]Contact Us[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Toggle Bar
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Welcome Say hello to the toggle bar. This is an optional section you can use to display any content you'd like. Simply select a page from the theme panel and the content of the page will display here. You can even use the drag and drop builder to create this! This is a perfect place for your company mission statement, alerts, notices or anything else.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing][vc_column_text]Get In Touch[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="10px"][vcex_list_item text_align="textleft" icon="envelope" color="#3b86b0" margin_right="10px" url_target="self"]Email: support@total.com[/vcex_list_item][vcex_list_item text_align="textleft" icon="phone-square" color="#3b86b0" margin_right="10px" url_target="self"]Phone: 1-800-Total-Theme[/vcex_list_item][vcex_list_item text_align="textleft" icon="map-marker" color="#3b86b0" margin_right="10px" url_target="self"]Address: Las Vegas, Nevada[/vcex_list_item][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Our Location[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing][vc_single_image image="4651"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Quisque faucibus eleifend dictum. Mauris rhoncus mollis nisl sed congue. Maecenas in lorem ut orci porta dapibus. Suspendisse velit nunc, scelerisque non.
